title: Deals: Bose QC 45 ANC headphones hit $279, Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE $150 off, more
content:
All of today’s best deals kick off with the Bose QuietComfort 45 ANC Headphones going on sale for only the second time. That’s alongside a chance to score the Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE at an all-time low and the Garmin Lily Smartwatch at $150. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

description: Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones deliver best-in-class ANC at $279, plus deals on Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE at $150 off and more.
